mapper.select: select * from announcement_board where announcementid between #{startNum} and #{endNum} order by announcementid desc
mapper.update: update announcement_board set hit=hit+1 where announcementId=#{announcementid}
mapper.select: select * from qna_table where qnaId=#{qnaId} and qnaPwd=#{qnaPwd}
select * from qna_table where pseq=#{qnaId} and step=1
mapper.insert: insert into qna_table values(SEQ_QNA_TABLE.nextval, #{qnaName}, #{title}, #{contents}, #{qnaPwd}, 0, SEQ_QNA_TABLE.currval, 0, SYSDATE)
